default_settings.value: Please select the word that best reflects your recent experience at St. Michaelâ€™s Health Network?

default_settings.name: Q_1
default_settings.value: For your most recent visit, how would you rate the length of time you had to wait in the waiting area and exam room before speaking with the health care provider about the reason for your visit?

default_settings.name: Q_2
default_settings.value: Thinking about the MAIN health care provider you spoke with during your visit, how would you rate their knowledge about your medical history and their attentiveness in listening to your concerns?

default_settings.name: Q_3
default_settings.value: Was your MAIN health care provider sensitive to your needs and preferences and did they treat you with dignity and respect?

default_settings.name: Q_4
default_settings.value: Did your MAIN health care provider explain things in a way that was easy to understand?

default_settings.name: Q_5
default_settings.value: Thinking about your most recent visit, how would you rate the overall cleanliness and physical comfort of the office/ clinic?

default_settings.name: Q_6
default_settings.value: Thinking of your overall experience with our office/clinic, what is done particularly well?
